pageContext.claim: “Just this week, Senate Democrats opposed legislation to prevent the killing of newborn infant children who survive abortions. Virtually every Democrat voted against protecting these precious babies.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats voted against a bill that would punish any doctor who failed to care for a child born alive after an attempted abortion. The bill would require a health-care practitioner to “exercise the same degree of professional skill, care, and diligence to preserve the life and health of the child” as he or she would to “any other child born alive at the same gestational age.” But infanticide is already illegal.
